Alastir
Tuesday, August 8th, 2017, 8:25:23 PM

I know they made an effort to condense the number of categories so it didn't seem overwhelming.

As an alternative to additional categories you might consider using the playershop or service tags on your post in one of the current folders.

You can add a tag to any 1st/original post in a category. It's a bar on the left side under the compose area.
